verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
<S%H8085>"Listen<s%> <S%H8085>carefully<s%> to my <S%H4405>speech,<s%> And let <S%H384>this<s%> be your [way of] <S%H8575>consolation.<s%>
<S%H5375>"Bear<s%> with me that I may <S%H1696>speak;<s%> Then <S%H310>after<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> you may <S%H3932>mock.<s%>
"As for me, is my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> to <S%H120>man<s%>? And <S%H4069>why<s%> should I not be <S%H9527>impatient<s%>?
<S%H6437>"Look<s%> at me, and be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> And <S%H7760>put<s%> [your] <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> [your] <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
"Even <S%H518>when<s%> I <S%H2142>remember,<s%> I am <S%H926>disturbed,<s%> And <S%H6427>horror<s%> <S%H270>takes<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> of my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
<S%H4069>"Why<s%> do the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> [still] <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H6275>Continue<s%> on, <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1396>become<s%> <S%H2428>very<s%> <S%H2428>powerful<s%>?
"Their <S%H2233>descendants<s%> are <S%H3559>established<s%> with them in their <S%H6440>sight,<s%> And their <S%H6631>offspring<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%>
Their <S%H1004>houses<s%> are <S%H7965>safe<s%> from <S%H6343>fear,<s%> <S%H3808>Neither<s%> is the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> on them.
"His <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5674>mates<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1602>fail;<s%> His <S%H6510>cow<s%> <S%H6403>calves<s%> and does not <S%H7921>abort.<s%>
"They <S%H7971>send<s%> forth their <S%H5759>little<s%> <S%H5759>ones<s%> like the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> And their <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H7540>skip<s%> <S%H7540>about.<s%>
"They <S%H5375>sing<s%> to the <S%H8596>timbrel<s%> and <S%H3658>harp<s%> And <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H5748>flute.<s%>
"They <S%H1086>spend<s%> their <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H9185>prosperity,<s%> And <S%H7281>suddenly<s%> they <S%H5181>go<s%> <S%H5181>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>
"And they <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5493>'Depart<s%> from us! We do not even <S%H2654>desire<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of Thy <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
<S%H4100>'Who<s%> is the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> that we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him, And <S%H4100>what<s%> would we <S%H3276>gain<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> we <S%H6293>entreat<s%> Him?'
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> their <S%H2898>prosperity<s%> is not in their <S%H3027>hand;<s%> The <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H7368>far<s%> from me.

<S%H4100>"How<s%> <S%H4100>often<s%> is the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1846>put<s%> out, Or [does] their <S%H343>calamity<s%> <S%H935>fall<s%> on them? Does God <S%H2505>apportion<s%> <S%H2256>destruction<s%> in His <S%H639>anger<s%>?
"Are they as <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> And like <S%H4671>chaff<s%> which the <S%H5492>storm<s%> <S%H1589>carries<s%> <S%H1589>away<s%>?
"[You say,] <S%H433>'God<s%> <S%H6845>stores<s%> <S%H6845>away<s%> a man's <S%H205>iniquity<s%> for his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>' Let God <S%H9608>repay<s%> him so that he may <S%H3045>know<s%> [it.]
"Let his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H3589>decay,<s%> And let him <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
"For <S%H4100>what<s%> does he <S%H2656>care<s%> for his <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, When the <S%H4557>number<s%> of his <S%H2320>months<s%> is <S%H2686>cut<s%> <S%H2686>off<s%>?
"Can anyone <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> In that He <S%H8199>judges<s%> those on <S%H7311>high<s%>?
<S%H2088>"One<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> in his <S%H8537>full<s%> <S%H6106>strength,<s%> Being <S%H3605>wholly<s%> at <S%H7600>ease<s%> and <S%H7961>satisfied;<s%>
His <S%H5845>sides<s%> are <S%H4390>filled<s%> out with <S%H2459>fat,<s%> And the <S%H4221>marrow<s%> of his <S%H6106>bones<s%> is <S%H8248>moist,<s%>
While <S%H2088>another<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> with a <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H3808>Never<s%> even <S%H398>tasting<s%> [anything] <S%H9186>good.<s%>
<S%H3162>"Together<s%> they <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> And <S%H7415>worms<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> them.
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H4284>thoughts,<s%> And the <S%H4209>plans<s%> by which you would <S%H2554>wrong<s%> me.

"For you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H346>'Where<s%> is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H5081>nobleman,<s%> And <S%H346>where<s%> is the <S%H168>tent,<s%> the <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>places<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>?'
"Have you not <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H5674>wayfaring<s%> <S%H1870><s%> men, And do you not <S%H5234>recognize<s%> their <S%H226>witness<s%>?
"For the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> is <S%H2820>reserved<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H343>calamity;<s%> They will be <S%H2986>led<s%> <S%H2986>forth<s%> at the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>fury.<s%>
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> will <S%H5046>confront<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him with his <S%H1870>actions,<s%> And <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H9608>repay<s%> him for what he has <S%H6213>done<s%>?
"While he is <S%H2986>carried<s%> to the <S%H6913>grave,<s%> [Men] will <S%H8245>keep<s%> <S%H8245>watch<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> [his] <S%H9071>tomb.<s%>

"The <S%H7263>clods<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> will <S%H4985>gently<s%> <S%H4985>cover<s%> him; Moreover, <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> will <S%H4900>follow<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, While <S%H369>countless<s%> <S%H4557><s%> ones [go] <S%H6440>before<s%> him.
<S%H349>"How<s%> then will you <S%H1892>vainly<s%> <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me, For your <S%H8666>answers<s%> <S%H7604>remain<s%> [full of] <S%H4604>falsehood<s%>?"
